error_404_message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
error_500_message: Something went wrong on our end. We're working to fix it.
contact_page_description: Have questions or need to schedule an appointment? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_form_message_placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact_form_success_message: Thank you for contacting us. We'll respond as soon as possible.
contact_form_error_message: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us via WhatsApp.
contact_form_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
contact_alternative_description: Contact us directly via WhatsApp for immediate assistance
